mapper.select: select dept_name , job_name , emp_name , work_status , off_given , off_used , off_available from employee join department using(dept_code) join job using(job_code) join attendance using(emp_no) join off using(emp_no)
select work_date , dept_name , emp_no , emp_name , start_time , end_time , work_time , after_time , work_status from attendance join employee using (emp_no) join department using (dept_code)

select emp_no , dept_name , job_name , emp_name , off_given , sum(off_used) as off_used , off_available , hire_date , off_start , TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, hire_date)/12,0) work_year from employee join department using(dept_code) join job using(job_code) join off using(emp_no) ${ condition } group by emp_no, dept_name, job_name, emp_name, off_given, off.off_used, off_available, hire_date, off_start
select off_cate_no , off_cate_name , off_cate_day from off_cate
